Package yaak.sim.schedule

This package implements action, action groups, and scheduling.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Scheduler Scheduler prescribes basic scheduling services.
 

Class Summary
Action Action encapsulates operations that are scheduled for execution by a scheduler.
ActionGroup ActionGroup encapsulates actions that are scheduled for execution by a scheduler.
ActionScheduler ActionScheduler provides basic scheduling services.
 

Exception Summary
ScheduleException ScheduleException reports extraordinary operations and/or states during scheduling.
 

Package yaak.sim.schedule Description

This package implements action, action groups, and scheduling.
